objectives.name: Save some cabbage from the vicious warclaw cubs.

objectives.hint: Obtained after participating in "Dance among the kodan" event.
objectives.name: Dance around the bonfire unter the moon's glow.

objectives.hint: Obtained after participating in "Help Frantic Hummingbird tend to the garden" event.
objectives.name: Help the lowlanders tend to their gardens in Harvest Den.

objectives.hint: Obtained after participating in "Collect frogs across the river and bring them back to the pot" event.
objectives.name: Carry frogs across the river.

objectives.hint: Obtained after participating in "Help the kodan relax in the hot springs" event.
objectives.name: Take a dip in the tundra hot springs.
